definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Please wait a moment, Jane is on another line.
sentences.chinese: 請等那一霎那，簡正在接另一條電話線。

sentences.english: Does this household have a fixed line telephone?
sentences.chinese: 本戶是否有固定的電話線？

sentences.english: She said the storm had brought down the telephone lines and I'd need to go to the signal box.
sentences.chinese: 她說是暴風雨把電話線給吹斷，我要到信號房去。

sentences.english: All you need is a phone line.
sentences.chinese: 你所需要的這是一條電話線。

sentences.english: Caller calls into the chat line.
It is common for heavy icicles to bring down power and telephone wires after an ice storm.
sentences.chinese: 是很常見的重型冰柱，以降低電力和電話線後，冰暴。

sentences.english: A flat-rate party line with two subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 一種兩個用戶合用的包月制電話線。

sentences.english: a telephone line connecting two exchanges directly.
sentences.chinese: 直接聯繫兩個交換器的電話線。

sentences.english: A generator for electricity. A well for water.
sentences.chinese: 沒有電話線，用發電機發電，打井來供應水源。

sentences.english: Then switchboards brought phone wires into one location.
sentences.chinese: 然後，交換臺使電話線集中到一個地點。

sentences.english: Today, my telephone line was hit by lightning.
sentences.chinese: 今天我的電話線被雷劈了。

sentences.english: Preceding but theory, say the regiment of nucleus that settle the layer, lack what, telephone line.
sentences.chinese: 就上篇而論，說了斷層的核團，缺什麼呢，電話線呀。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cable is rapidly replacing twisted-pair telephone lines.
sentences.chinese: 光纜正迅速地取代雙絞線的電話線。

sentences.english: The lines that carry cable television are much faster than standard phone lines or even ISDN.
sentences.chinese: 運載有線電視的線比標準電話線甚至ISDN快速。

sentences.english: One Flat rate residential phone line.
sentences.chinese: 一種包月制住宅電話線。

sentences.english: Like ISDN, ADSL will use normal qualified copper phone lines.
sentences.chinese: 和ISDN一樣，ADSL使用普通合格的銅電話線。

definition: to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
to suffer defeat in every battle (idiom)
to tolerate is to nurture an evildoer (idiom); spare the rod and spoil the child
